content:
I recently needed to convert my Putty SSH files into OpenSSH so I could use them in NuSphere.
  1. Open your private key in PuTTYGen
  2. Export it in OpenSSH format. Top menu "Conversions"->"Export OpenSSH key".
  3. Save the new OpenSSH key when prompted.
title: Converting Putty SSH keys to OpenSSH
name: converting-putty-ssh-keys-to-openssh

comments.author: Cameron
comments.comment: What about the opposite problem?  Windows (client) user with PuTTY wants to generate an OpenSSH public key for use in his authorized_keys on his unix web hosting.
